Moritz Wilhelm Schreiber   
Personal Information

Telephone : +49 176 96052591  Emai l: moritz.schreiber@outlook.com

Personal Information    
  
Birth day and -place : 26.06.1986 in Stuttgart  Nationality : German  
Address : Avenue des Villas 28 , 2A, 1060 Saint -Gilles , Belgium  
Telephone : +49 176 96052591  Emai l: moritz.schreiber@outlook.com  
   
Work Experience     
   
05/201 7 – today  Project leader  RC CO 2 electro -conversion , Total Energies , TEOTB , CCU : 
  - Led the project within the CO2 conversion theme from the start.  
- Project became R&D flagship project of potential strategic in terest. 
- Budget increase d from 0 ,4M€ to 5M€/y , internal personnel headcount increase d from 2  to 6. 
- Plann ing and leading  external research collaborations to addre ss main technical questions.  
- Coordinating  integration  of new colleagues ( e.g. developing objectives, organiz ing training s). 
- Establi shed  a fully equipped CO 2 electro -conversion laboratory at the TEOTB . 
- Collaborati ng with TEA/LCA teams to set up models for evaluation and steering R&D.  
- Comparing CO 2 electro -conversion with competing  CO 2 conversion pathways.  
- Initiated and coordinating  potential project with Siemens Energy for industrialization .  
- Initiated R&D on high -temperature electrolysis  for syngas production.   
 05/2017 – 05/2019  Research Engineer Catalysis: Hydrotreating for Biofuels , Total RC, TRTF, CRBC .    
Planned, set up and coordinated first pilot tests for production of sustainable HVO biodiesel, biojet 
and Avgas in support of the start -up of Total’s La Mède biorefinery . 
01/2013 - 05/2017  Research scientist at chair of Technical Chemistry II (Prof. Dr. J. A. Lercher) , Tech. Univ. München   
Development  and coordination of research projects on heterogeneous catalysis for algae oil 
conversion to kerosene  in industry -oriented  project Algenflugkraft (Partners: Clariant, Airbus  etc.). 
03/2011 – 09/2011  Master's Thesis (ENSCP) at Bitumen Department , Raffinage et Marketing , CReS,  Total,  France   
Topic: Study on the Performance Improvement of Polymer Modified Bitumen . 
07/2008 – 09/2008  Internship in oil refinery , Amreya Petroleum Refining Company, Alexandria, Egypt  
Higher Education    
  
01/2013 – 05/2017  Ph.D. at chair of Technical Chemistry II (Prof. Dr. J. A. Lercher),  Technische Universität München   
Topic: Catalytic conversion of algae oil to kerosene   
Articles published in peer -reviewed journals  (e.g. JACS) and presentations  given  at int. conf erences.    
09/2010 - 08/2011  Mas ter of Science in Chemistry (M2 ), ENSCP  - Chimie Paristech/ENS/ESPCI/UPMC   
Major subject: Industrial Chemical Processes  Minor subject: Future Fuels and Energy Mix    
04/2010 - 09/2012  Master of Sci ence in Chemistry : Technische Universität München (TUM), Munich   
Major subject: Technical Chemistry   Minor subject: Analytical chemistry    
10/2006 - 03/2010  Bachelor of Science in Chemistry , Technische Universität München (TUM), Munich  
Languages   
  German (mother language), French, English.  
Extracurricular Activities   
  
2009 – 2010  Initiated Erasmus partnership between Technische Universität München and Chimie Paristech.   
2008 - today  Sailing: Recent successful project: Channel crossing Cherbourg – Isle of Wight.  
2007 – 2010 Founder and CFO of the association TUM Studenten e.V. (ca. 250 members, annual budget ca. 3000€)  
2007 – 2009  Several representative  positions at the Studentenwer k München  and the Deutsches Studentenwerk . 
 
Saint -Gilles , 17.02.2021           Moritz Schreiber

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
